A tab view can appear as a sidebar in [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewStyle/sidebarAdaptable]. Sidebar tabs represent all of the tabs in a tab view.

# sidebar

**Type Property**

The sidebar of a tab view.

## Declaration

```swift
static let sidebar: AdaptableTabBarPlacement
```

## Discussion

A tab view can appear as a sidebar in [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewStyle/sidebarAdaptable]. Sidebar tabs represent all of the tabs in a tab view.
title: sidebar
